title: Rengar cant be picked?
body: Is he banned, and for how long? thx

replies.body:
{{champion:107}} **Rengar** has been temporarily disabled due to [this](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aJX-oK5npns) bug.
There hasn't been any official announcement on how long it might take, but I'd expect it shouldn't be much longer than a day.

erhmahgherd rango hers bergs? Frontline should sort him out.

https://www.vetsupply.com.au/images/pet-supplies-pack/frontline-plus-for-cats-6.jpg

it hasnt been put into the alert thing in the client yet tho

and im pretty sure that it should me pm not am "Network Operations â€“ 7:29 AM
We've temporarily disabled Rengar due to an in-game bug, and are working on fixing the problem." if it was noticed after the aatrox :/
The notification seems to be a little delayed getting to **OCE**. Not really sure what's going on. But if you change your client to **NA**, you'll see the notification for **Rengar**.

do you know what the bug is?

all the videos on it are foreign regions so maybe only them, I dont know, but ap rengar new meta.

The bug can be found [here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aJX-oK5npns), the notification doesn't appear in the client however is visible on the [Service Status page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_AU#oce)
i knew what the bug was, i was telecasterdude to see if they know, hence the "ap rengar new meta." because of the perma w spam and its high scaling. 5 x 80% ap in 3 sec = done of damage
Ugh thanks for the info, hopefully he gets fixed soon :(
